DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effect Food Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics Safety CKD-519 ( CKD-519 FDI )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between 19 age 55 age healthy adult 2 . Body weight 55kg male , 50kg female 3 . Body Mass Index 18.5 25 ( body mass index=kg/m2 ) 4 . If female , must include one among item The menopause ( natural menses least 2 year ) Surgical Infertility ( hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy , tubal ligation method infertility condition ) 5 . If men sexual life woman childbearing age , Necessarily agree use condom sperm donation two month clinical trial final dosage investigational product 6 . Those fully understand clinical trial enough hearing , decide join clinical trial comply precaution write consent 1 . Have clinically significant disease hepatobiliary system ( severe hepatic impairment , etc . ) , kidney ( severe renal impairment , etc . ) , nervous system , immune system , respiratory system , endocrine system , haematooncology disease , cardiovascular system ( heart failure , etc . ) mental illness , history mental disease . 2 . Have gastrointestinal disease history effect drug absorption ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer , etc . ) surgery ( except simple appendectomy hernia surgery ) 3 . Hypersensitivity reaction clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction history drug additives . 4 . An impossible one participate clinical trial include screen test ( medical history taking , BP , 12lead ECG , physical examination , blood & urine laboratory test result ) 28 day take investigational product . 5 . Defined follow laboratory parameter AST ( Aspartate aminotransferase ) , ALT ( Alanine aminotransferase ) > 1.25* upper limit normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5* upper limit normal range CPK ( Creatine phosphokinase ) > 1.5* upper limit normal range eGFR ( Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate , use MDRD ( Modification Diet Renal Disease ) method ) < 60 mL/min/1.73m2 6 . Sitting SBP ( Systolic Blood Pressure ) > 150 mmHg < 90 mmHg , sit DBP ( Diastolic Blood Pressure ) > 100 mmHg 50 mmHg , 5 minute break . 7 . Drug abuse history drug abuse show positive urine drug test . 8 . Pregnant lactating woman . 9 . A heavy caffeine consumer ( caffeine > 5 cups/day ) , alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 210g/week ) , smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day ) 10 . Subject take ethical drug herbal medicine within 14 day , OTC ( Over The Counter Drug ) within 7 day begin study treatment investigator determine take drug affect study could affect safety subject 11 . Subject take inhibitor inducer drug metabolize enzyme ( Barbiturates etc . ) within 30days . 12 . Taking food contain grapefruit within 7 day begin study treatment ( ex . Drinking contain grapefruit 1 liter per day within 7days begin study treatment ) 13 . Subject treat investigational drug within 90 day begin study treatment . 14 . Previously donate whole blood within 60 day component blood within 30days . 15 . An impossible one participant clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result another reason . 16 . Positive Serology test ( Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV )
